com.monals.de.gyg.repository

Class ReviewsDataSource

  • com.monals.de.gyg.repository.ReviewsDataSource

  • public class ReviewsDataSource

    Class in charge of smoothly fethching data from the server. Returns a PageKeyedDataSource

      Class in charge of smoothly fethching data from the server. Returns a PageKeyedDataSource

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Callback that loads every next chunk of data when the user reaches a certain position in the RecyclerView.
      void loadBefore(androidx.paging.PageKeyedDataSource.LoadParams<java.lang.Integer> params, androidx.paging.PageKeyedDataSource.LoadCallback<java.lang.Integer,com.monals.de.gyg.models.Review> callback)
      Load before should have been used if the loading started somewhere from the middle of the list. In our case we're loading from the begining, therefore it's empty.
      void loadInitial(androidx.paging.PageKeyedDataSource.LoadInitialParams<java.lang.Integer> params, androidx.paging.PageKeyedDataSource.LoadInitialCallback<java.lang.Integer,com.monals.de.gyg.models.Review> callback)
      Callback that loads the initial chunk of data.
